verses.verse: Whence <S%G4159><s%> come <S%G4171>wars<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> whence come <S%G3163>fightings<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>? come they <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1782>hence<s%>, even <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2237>pleasures<s%> that <S%G4754>war<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3196>members<s%>?

Ye3432, 2532 <S%G3428>adulteresses<s%>, know <S%G1492>ye<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G5373>friendship<s%> of the <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G2189>enmity<s%> with <S%G2316>God<s%>? Whosoever3739, Leviticus2 <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1014>would<s%> <S%G1511>be<s%> a <S%G5384>friend<s%> of the <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G2525>maketh<s%> himself an <S%G2190>enemy<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

Or <S%G1380>think<s%> ye <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G1124>scripture<s%> <S%G3004>speaketh<s%> in <S%G2761>vain<s%>? Doth the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> <S%G2730>which<s%> he made <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G2730>dwell<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G1971>long<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G5355>envying<s%>?

But <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G1325>giveth<s%> <S%G3173>more<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%>. <S%G1352>Wherefore<s%> the scripture <S%G3004>saith<s%>, <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G498>resisteth<s%> the <S%G5244>proud<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1325>giveth<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> to the <S%G5011>humble<s%>.
Be <S%G5293>subject<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> unto <S%G2316>God<s%>; but <S%G436>resist<s%> the <S%G1228>devil<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> he will <S%G5343>flee<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>.

Draw <S%G1448>nigh<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> he will draw <S%G1448>nigh<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%>. <S%G2511>Cleanse<s%> your <S%G5495>hands<s%>, ye <S%G268>sinners<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G48>purify<s%> your <S%G2588>hearts<s%>, ye <S%G1374>doubleminded<s%>.
Humble <S%G5013>yourselves<s%> in the sight <S%G1799>of<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> he shall exalt5312, 5312 <S%G5209>you<s%>.

Speak <S%G2635><s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> one <S%G2635>against<s%> <S%G240>another<s%>, <S%G80>brethren<s%>. He <S%G3588>that<s%> speaketh <S%G2635>against<s%> a <S%G80>brother<s%>, <S%G2532>or<s%> <S%G2919>judgeth<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%>, speaketh <S%G2635>against<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2919>judgeth<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> thou <S%G2919>judgest<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>, thou <S%G1488>art<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> a <S%G4163>doer<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> a <S%G2923>judge<s%>.

One <S%G1520><s%> only <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G3550>lawgiver<s%> and <S%G3588>judge<s%>, even he who is <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G622>destroy<s%>: but <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G1488>art<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G2919>judgest<s%> thy <S%G2087>neighbor<s%>?

whereas <S%G3748><s%> ye <S%G1987>know<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3588>what<s%> shall be on the <S%G839>morrow<s%>. <S%G1063><s%> <S%G4169>What<s%> is <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%>? For ye <S%G2076>are<s%> <S%G1063>a<s%> <S%G822>vapor<s%>, that <S%G5316>appeareth<s%> <S%G4314>for<s%> a little <S%G3641>time<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G1899>then<s%> vanisheth <S%G853>away<s%>.

For <S%G473>that<s%> <S%G5209>ye<s%> ought to <S%G3004>say<s%>, <S%G1437>If<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2532>will<s%>, we shall both <S%G2198>live<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%>.

To him <S%G3767>therefore<s%> that <S%G1492>knoweth<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4160>doeth<s%> it <S%G3361>not<s%>, to <S%G846>him<s%> it <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%>.
